title: Standard Field
content:
From SmartWiki
(Redirected from 
Standard Fields
)
 Jump to: 
navigation
, 
search
A built-in data field associated with a 
SmartSimple
 
entity
 such as a 
contact
, 
company
 or activity. In general, these fields cannot be changed, although some can be renamed and controlled via links on the 
Global Settings
 page or on the Entity Settings Page within the 
UTA
.
See Also

Contact and Account Standard Fields

List of Standard Fields at Level 1
 
List of Standard Fields at Level 2
